review:
Excellent product with good charging support  
Supports my thinkpad yoga 460 laptop  
And 5 star for amazon , just delivered it in 48 hours and no extra charge for
even non-prime members from Thane to Patna with COD.....  
Love amazon

Genuine and Original from Lenovo. Value for money. Thumbs Up. For removing
confusion this box contain both, Power Adapter and Power Cord. Power Adapter
is not with Indicator light. Also able to charge G40 & G50 Series Lenovo
Laptops.

First Impression WOW ,i got original Seal Pack Lenovo Laptop Charger @1080/-  
Seal Box carry - Charger,Extension cable,warranty card,Instruction Guide,User
Guide etc.  
Original Charger 100% , Thanks to Seller & Team

Thank you to the seller istuff365.  
  
Got the genuine product.

Update - after about an year of using it, a loose connection developed inside
the cable near the DC plug - the power cuts out and it has to be placed at a
precise angle for it to work. Consider that this is good for short term or
emergency/backup purpose, cannot rely long term as the sole adapter for
laptop.  
Previous review - Original item and very good quality. Using it with Lenovo
Yoga 2 Pro. Working perfectly for over a month now. Came with a 3-pin Indian
mains plug.  
Note: If you have a Lenovo laptop with a rectangular yellow power input socket
and the sticker at the back has INPUT: 20V 3.25A or anything less than that,
then this adapter will work for you for sure.

I bought this since I lost my original charger, and this charger does the job
perfectly. Also, you won't find this charger at a price less than ₹1500
anywhere in markets, so it was a great deal.

Affordable

Didn't worked with my laptop so had to returned it... Got the money back in my
account without any problem

Works as intended.

my purchase.

During my recent travel to India I forgot to bring my Original Lenovo Charger
that I got along with my Lenovo G510 Laptop (bought in Dubai). I called a
supplier in Chennai to ask for a Lenovo G510 charger , he quoted me Rs.2200/=.
I thought his quoted price was very high, so I searched Amazon for Original
Lenovo charger and got information about this product. I immediately ordered
online for Rs.1210/=. I got the piece home delivered within the next 3 days
(from Ahmedabad). This Charger perfectly fits and works fine with my Laptop. I
am Quite happy about the product
